title: Mini-Ep 175: Supported Boobs and Cream Tubes
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 175: Supported Boobs and Cream Tubes
itunes:subtitle: Kate gets a new bra with the help of a Zoom bra-fitting, and Doree falls in love with an affordable sweatsuit set. Then, they hear from listeners about nighttime face creams and spending diets, and some therapist listeners weigh in about breaking-up wi...
description:
Kate gets a new bra with the help of a Zoom bra-fitting, and Doree falls in love with an affordable sweatsuit set. Then, they hear from listeners about nighttime face creams and spending diets, and some therapist listeners weigh in about breaking-up with your therapist.


Activity of the Week: Lasagna Love


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).


Office Hours info can be found here.
